Class Colony

  • java.lang.Object
    • Colony

  • public class Colony
extends Object
    this class generates a number of ants based on the Ant class it creates an ArrayList of Ants and adds and deletes ants as well as it manages all the functions that belong to the Ant class
    Version:
    05/03/2014 15:23:03
    Author:
    CRHanna

    • Constructor Detail

      • Colony

        public Colony(Home antHome,
      Predator predator,
      Home predatorHome)
        Write a description of this constructor here.
        Parameters:
        antHome - where the ants start their initial position and the wander around foraging when they find food they follow the home Pheromone to home when they reach home the ant is removed and a new ant is created
        predator - 1 methods that belong to the class predator are called in the colony class the method: predator.fleeFromAnts(ants, predatorHome, m) this method makes the predator flee from the ants when it is at proximity of more than 3 the predator is also linked to the 2 methods attackPredator(predator, ants) & fleePredator(predator) which make the ants attack the predator and flee from it
        predatorHome - this method is called in this method: predator.fleeFromAnts(ants, predatorHome, m); where it is used to make the predator go back to its home when attacked by ants and it is used in antTrapped(predatorHome) method where the ant will be trapped if it gets into the predator home

    • Method Detail

      • addAnt

        public void addAnt()
        this method generates new ants based on the location of the class Ant which is added to the arraylist ants

      • addAnt

        public void addAnt(int num)
        this method generates new ants based on the location of the class Ant which is added to the arraylist ants in addition this method offers the ability to specify the number of ants that should be added. It is used to add ants from the menu
        Parameters:
        num - specifies the number of ants to be added to the scene the maximium nimber f ants that can exist is 40

      • getAnts

        public  getAnts()
        Returns:
        returns the ArrayList Ants whenever called

      • eatenByPredator

        public void eatenByPredator(Predator p)
        this method makes the ant get eaten by the predator when it attacks it.
        Parameters:
        predator - the predator PVector location is accessed in order to set the distance between the ant and the predator

      • addAnt

        public void addAnt(Menu menu)
        this method is related to the ant icon on the menu when the ant icon is clicked 1 ant is added the maximum number of ants that can exist is 40.
        Parameters:
        menu - the menu boolean condition is addAnt is accessed
